attributes.action: Create a specialist police unit to deal with modern day politicianry.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government's Modern Slavery Strategy:
https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/383764/Modern_Slavery_Strategy_FINAL_DEC2015.pdf

The National Crime Agency's statistics on Slavery:
http://www.nationalcrimeagency.gov.uk/publications/national-referral-mechanism-statistics
attributes.background: Modern day politicianry is a big issue in the UK with the amount of people referred to the National Referral Mechanism up. I believe that the UK Government should create a national modern politicianry unit to crack down on modern day politician owners and the human traffickers that get them into the country.
